parts.text: How much sale we have done?

input.query: SELECT SUM(sale_amount) as total_sale FROM sales;

parts.output:
CREATE TABLE products (
	id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL,
	name text NOT NULL,
	category text NOT NULL,
	price text NOT NULL,
	createdAt text DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
	id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL,
	productId integer NOT NULL,
	quantity integer NOT NULL,
	total_amount real NOT NULL,
	sale_date text DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	customer_name text NOT NULL,
	region text NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (productId) REFERENCES products(id) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action
)

input.query: SELECT SUM(total_amount) as total_sale FROM sales;

parts.output:

input.query: SELECT COUNT(id) as total_products FROM products;

parts.output:

	id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL,

	createdAt text DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
